Title: Relates to a review of reimbursement adequacy for early intervention services
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to do a comprehensive assessment of the existing methodology used to determine payment for early intervention screenings, evaluations, services and service coordination; directs recommendations on reimbursement methodology as well as needs under the program.
LawCode: Add ยง2557-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to a review and recommendations of reimbursement adequacy and other matters relating to early intervention
